short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The GitKraken Browser Extension bridges your hosted git repositories to GitKraken Desktop and with GitLens in VS Code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The GitKraken Browser Extension seamlessly connects your GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, and Azure DevOps repositories to GitKraken Desktop and GitLens in VS Code. 

Not being able to visualize the changes you‚Äôre making in Git can be a stress-inducing experience. Let GitKraken Desktop or GitLens take the anxiety out of your commits by illuminating the impact of every Git operation so you can make safer, more informed choices.  

Experience a new level of efficiency and control with the GitKraken Browser Extension. Whether you are an individual developer or part of a collaborative team, this extension boosts your GitHub and GitLab workflow.


‚û§ Track Your PRs

SEE PRS BY STATUS: Keep track of your PRs from your browser with Launchpad. The GitKraken Browser Extension organizes your pull requests by status, and identifies which pull requests need your attention.

OPEN PRS INSTANTLY: Open PRs in GitHub, GitLab, Azure DevOps, or Bitbucket to take action on a PR by opening it in a new browser tab.

ACCESS CODE SUGGESTIONS: There‚Äôs an easier way to recommend changes. View PR code suggestions created by you or other GitKraken users.


‚û§ Work More Effectively With GitHub, GitLab, Azure DevOps, and BitBucket 

With this browser extension enabled, you get options inside github.com, gitlab.com, bitbucket.org, and dev.azure.com to open repositories and commits in GitKraken Desktop or with GitLens in VS Code.

üñ• OPEN WITH GITKRAKEN: Enjoy the convenience of quick access to GitKraken Desktop or GitLens in VS Code right from GitHub's Code and GitLab‚Äôs Clone dropdowns. With a single click, you can open a repository directly in GitKraken Desktop‚Äôs robust UI or with GitLens in VS Code.

‚§¥Ô∏è OPEN COMPARISON IN VS CODE: Say goodbye to manual navigation. When viewing pull requests on GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, or Azure DevOps, the extension adds a "Open Comparison in VS Code" option to the Code dropdowns for an easy transition into GitLens in VS Code.

üìÑ OPEN WITH GITKRAKEN button on commit pages: Keeping track of your commits is now more accessible than ever. The GitKraken Browser extension adds a dedicated "Open with GitKraken" button to GitHub's, GitLab‚Äôs, Bitbucket's, or Azure DevOp's commit pages. 


‚û§ Trusted by our users

‚ÄúAll our developers are using GitKraken Desktop and it became a standard in our R&D organization. The UX is just awesome! Every action can be done in just a few clicks. The interface works so fast and intuitive that even our most experienced coders prefer this tool over the git command line.‚Äù  ‚∏∫ Lansweeper

‚ÄúGitKraken is the best multi platform GUI client. Our developers save 1-2 hours a week using the client.‚Äù  ‚∏∫ Stratio Automotive

‚ÄúWhen I'm setting up my development environment on a new machine GitLens is a must install. Worktrees enabled by GitLens+ allow me to easily work in multiple branches, improving my ability to collaborate with developers on my team when the work is spread out across multiple pull requests and branches.‚Äù  ‚∏∫ iSight

 
‚û§ Download GitKraken Desktop for Free

Ready to try the legendary Git GUI for Windows, Mac and Linux? Download it today: https://www.gitkraken.com/git-client/try-free

‚û§ Install GitLens on VS Code for Free

Learn why GitLens is the #1 Git extension on the VS Code marketplace. Install it today: https://www.gitkraken.com/gitlens/try-free

NOTE: The GitKraken Browser Extension requires the GitKraken Desktop or GitLens on VS Code to be installed on your machine for complete functionality.
